law.catch_line: No person may transport, offer for transportation, sell, offer or expose for sale within the State, ...

text.section: A person may not alter or substitute sod in any manner that may defeat the purpose of the provisions of this subtitle.
A person may not disseminate any false or misleading advertisement in any manner concerning sod, sod mixtures, plugs, or sprigs.

A person may not fail to comply with, or supply false information in reply to a "stop-sale order", or remove tags attached to or dispose of sod, sod mixtures, plugs, or sprigs held under the order, except as specified by the enforcement officer.
